summary: Full stack Software developer with 6+ years of experience building web applications using React, TypeScript, NodeJS, SQL and cloud-native systems. Experienced in delivering end to end features: from UI/UX prototyping to backend REST APIs, authentication, real-time dashboards, and cloud deployment. Focused on building simple and intuitive features for complicated problems that make a better experience for the user.

skills_interests.Frontend: JavaScript, React JS, Redux, TypeScript, Angular, React Native, Blazor, Bootstrap
skills_interests.Version Control/ SDLC/ tools: Jira, Scrum, Git, Agile, Figma, Kanban

description: Led the redesign of web applications, modernizing both application architecture and website design by restructuring frontend and backend into a loosely coupled modular system using JavaScript, Blazor, and React.
Prototyped data-dense dashboards in Figma, collaborating with satellite controllers to refine designs, establish visual hierarchy, and surface critical information.
Designed reusable, stateless React and TypeScript components, decoupling business logic for cross-application reuse.
Improved dashboard performance by upgrading LightningChart to version 6, eliminating per-frame cursor redraws and reducing lag.
Reduced network latency by replacing HTTP polling with C# gRPC streaming using Protobuf serialization and persistent TCP connections, supporting 50% more concurrent operators.
Built real-time and historical data systems using WebSockets/SignalR for live telemetry and GraphQL APIs for historical data across distributed .NET services.
Deployed scalable satellite operations applications using Azure and Kubernetes with CI/CD automation.
Facilitated office hours and supported students in Design and Analysis of Algorithms.
Assisted students with Database and Web System Development concepts and problem-solving.
Led a team of six front-end engineers, driving application design, code reviews, and performance optimization in ReactJS with Redux for centralized state management.
Built shared GitHub-based frontend component libraries reused across five teams, standardizing UI/UX.
Implemented Microsoft login using OAuth 2.0 integrated with Azure Functions.
Developed an API Gateway in Node.js using MVC patterns to centralize routing and authentication.
Reduced QA testing time by 60% with Mocha-based unit tests for NodeJS services.
Optimized healthcare RESTful APIs using Go, improving query efficiency and implementing PostgreSQL encryption.
Improved read performance by migrating SQL-heavy operations to MongoDB, increasing response speed by 30%.
Containerized services with Docker and implemented CI/CD pipelines across AWS environments.
Developed AWS Lambda functions for event-driven email notifications.
Built responsive web applications using HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, React, and TypeScript.
Built AngularJS applications and integrated REST APIs to display data in user interfaces.
Used PostgreSQL for data storage and retrieval.
Created low-fidelity wireframes for improving existing websites.
Built a Windows desktop application for pharmacy management using C# and .NET.
Implemented CRUD operations in relational databases for data storage and retrieval.

education: Master of Computer Science (GPA : 3.7) Jan 2022 - Dec 2023
Southern Illinois University Edwardsville Edwardsville, IL ,USA
Bachelor of Engineering, Computer Engineering Aug 2014 – Sep 2018
Executive Member of Sagarmatha Nepalese Student Association Aug 2022 - May 2023
Microsoft Student Partner at Microsoft Innovation Center , Kathmandu, Nepal Sept 2016 – Sept 2017
● Mentored students to teach them the basics of programming. Participated in hackathons and boot camps

projects.title: Real-Time Satellite Systems Dashboard
description: Built a real-time satellite monitoring dashboard with lazy loading where telemetry updates automatically as new events are generated, ensuring operators always see the latest system state.
Created mock gRPC servers to simulate real-time telemetry streams, allowing frontend development and testing to proceed independently of backend data availability.
Implemented secure frontend authentication flows using SCRAM challenge-response and server-side sessions, leveraging React useContext to manage global authentication state and session persistence.

projects.title: Preprocessing Embedding Vectors for Improved Classification of Genres Using Lyrics
description: Enhanced music genre classification by refining test datasets through lyrics analysis.
Implemented lyrics-embedding preprocessing using NumPy and pandas, filtering high cosine-similarity vectors to minimize semantic overlap.
Improved accuracy for Logistic Regression, Gaussian Naive Bayes, and Neural Network models.
Contributed improvements to music recommendation systems and advanced natural language processing research.

projects.title: Information Retrieval System
description: Developed a scalable multi-tenant SaaS application for centralized email management in a React, Node.js, and Python environment.
Led a front-end development team of five using ReactJS for design reviews and optimized application flow.
Developed reusable React components with Hooks, including both generic and feature-specific implementations.
Implemented advanced filtering logic mapping URL parameters to checkbox state, ensuring persistent filters across refreshes and direct links.
Orchestrated a complex data migration transferring over 100,000 email records from Outlook and Gmail to PostgreSQL, using Redis to optimize data access and maintain responsiveness.
Deployed applications using Docker containers on AWS and engineered an automated CI/CD pipeline on Buddy to ensure seamless, continuous delivery.

projects.title: Management System for Drug Discovery
description: Owned features end-to-end from planning through deployment.
Developed generic, parameter-driven features and reusable components that improved adaptability across modules and reduced duplication.
Built functionality to transform web-based charts into Excel sheets and vice versa.
Engineered an advanced filtering system with six distinct criteria to improve user experience, complemented by lazy loading for efficient page rendering.
Configured Webpack for development, QA, and production environments to streamline deployment workflows.
